sentences.sContent: It is prepared by reacting anhydrous ammonia and carbon dioxide gas under very high pressure in the presence of a suitable catalyst.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is prepared by reacting anhydrous ammonia and carbon dioxide gas under very high pressure in the presence of a suitable catalyst.
sentences.sCn: 它是在某种催化剂参与下，由无水氨和二氧化碳气体在高压条件下反应生成的。

sentences.sContent: During ionic polymerization and group transfer polymerization, the absolute need to be transferred to the reactor anhydrous reagents.
sentences.sContent_eng: During ionic polymerization and group transfer polymerization, the absolute need to be transferred to the reactor anhydrous reagents.
sentences.sCn: 在进行离子型聚合和基团转移聚合时，需要将绝对无水试剂转移到反应装置。

sentences.sContent: Such vegetal essences as yeast and peony and anhydrous caffeine can constantly take effect in sensitive eye skin and restrain the production of melanin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such vegetal essences as yeast and peony and anhydrous caffeine can constantly take effect in sensitive eye skin and restrain the production of melanin.
sentences.sCn: 酵母精华、牡丹精华等植物精华与无水咖啡因能持续作用于敏感的眼部肌肤，同时抑制黑色素的生成。

remMethod.val: an (无， 不) + hydr (水) + ous → 无水的

trans.tranOther: containing no water, esp no water of crystallization
